note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, death rates are [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized). Non-melanoma skin cancers are excluded due to potentially incomplete records and inconsistent registry practices.
title: Death rate from cancers vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: Estimated annual number of deaths from all types of [cancer](#dod:cancer) per 100,000 people versus gross domestic product (GDP) per capita, measured in constant international-$.
